amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Cloture motion on amendment SA 4751 withdrawn by unanimous consent in Senate.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 4751 presented in Senate.
Amendment SA 4751 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Gregg. (consideration: CR S4072, S4073-4079) In the nature of a substitute.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4751 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Gregg.
